name: Combo Pack - Madagascar 3 - Europe's Most Wanted + Croods, The - Prehistoric Party! [3DS]
description:
Madagascar 3 & The Croods: Combo Pack is an arcade-platformer game developed by Torus Games. It was originally released in 2013. D3 Publisher published the game.
You can play Madagascar 3 & The Croods: Combo Pack on Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo DS.
